titles.title: Americans Need A Healthcare Ruling Act

To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the prohibition on suits to restrain assessment or collection of tax does not apply to the tax provisions of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act or the Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E2169)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 12/2/2011--Introduced. Americans Need A Healthcare Ruling Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt any lawsuit brought under the tax provisions of the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act or the Health Care and Education Reconciliation Act of 2010 from the general prohibition against lawsuits to restrain the assessment or collection of tax.
